files.content:
"use client"

import {
  Pagination,
  PaginationContent,
  PaginationItem,
  PaginationLink,
  PaginationNext,
  PaginationPrevious,
} from "@/components/ui/pagination"

export function Pattern() {
  return (
    <Pagination>
      <PaginationContent>
        <PaginationItem>
          <PaginationPrevious href="#" />
        </PaginationItem>
        <PaginationItem>
          <PaginationLink
            href="#"
            className="hover:border-border hover:border!"
          >
            1
          </PaginationLink>
        </PaginationItem>
        <PaginationItem>
          <PaginationLink href="#" isActive>
            2
          </PaginationLink>
        </PaginationItem>
        <PaginationItem>
          <PaginationLink
            href="#"
            className="hover:border-border hover:border!"
          >
            3
          </PaginationLink>
        </PaginationItem>
        <PaginationItem>
          <PaginationNext href="#" />
        </PaginationItem>
      </PaginationContent>
    </Pagination>
  )
}
